resources.string: Sign with Google to upload your achievements and share with friends.

There was an issue with sign in. Please try again later.
Please place the device in portrait mode, then click the Capture button, then take two pictures/record two videos (rear-facing, then front-facing).
Please place the device in landscape mode, then click the Capture button, then take two pictures/record two videos (rear-facing, then front-facing).
The ZIP file shown below on external storage contains the test results to submit with your issue.
